channel.title: HELP [pi]
channel.description: Ok so im trying to make duel arena perfect atm i have everything working except when you are counting down like when it says "3 , 2, 1, FIGHT" you can attack while its counting down still like you can attack your enemy while it says 3 or 2 ,1 im wondering how would i make it so that you can only attack after then count down is done:)

item.title: HELP [pi]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Try making it so they can’t move. Like set their frozen timer (like barrage) to 3 seconds when they enter the game. Its simple, but it should work. Hope I could help some.

Read full topic
